attributes.action: If England win the world cup in 2022 the squad should be the faces on new coins.
attributes.background: This petition has been set up for personal reasons for England's love for Harry Maguire and Gareth Southgate.

rejection.details: Coins are manufactured and issued by the Royal Mint, not the UK Government or Parliament. You can find out more here: https://www.royalmint.com/discover/uk-coins/coin-design-and-specifications/
